summary: Three teenagers plan to steal the necessary funds to open their dream shop in the US, but things get messy.
cast: Marie Gillain|Olivier Sitruk|Bruno Putzulu|Richard Berry|Philippe Duclos|Marie Ravel|Clotilde Courau|Jean-Louis Richard|Christophe Odent|Jean-Paul Comart|Philippe Héliès|Jacky Nercessian|Alain Sarde|Daniel Russo|Philippe Torreton|François Berléand|François Levantal|Thierry Gimenez|Isabelle Sadoyan|Laurent Arnal|Jeanne Goupil|Fulvio Trogli|Carole Pommes|Claire Vidoni|Bobby Pacha|Arnaud Churin|Myriam Balassiano|Sandrine Desio|Laurent Klug|Thierry Beccaro|Françoise Descarrega
title: La carnaza
